price: 3. Iš tiesų, Mes vedėme jį į kelią, dėkingas jis bus ar nedėkingas.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
